documents.document: @ChouettBlog @CluelessCurl I totally agree.

@BlippyTheSlug I say that when I come home sometimes, too. Hehe.

@CluelessCurl Life is good today, thanks. How are you?
@jdubqca And you as well. :)

Good morning, Twitter!
@Spark_to_Write And something tells me that @jk_rowling is really good at cake-related activities. 😄
This is delightful. https://t.co/V7y9fFNNHG
@GPBoozyFoodie Too funny.
@ShykiaBell Thank you.
@IndieMomOfGirls Aww, That’s lovely.
@jdubqca @Trace15 Adoption can be a good thing, but it shouldn’t be preferred over keeping families together whenever possible.
@jdubqca @Trace15 And I say that as someone who has half a dozen deeply loved relatives who were adopted.
@jdubqca @Trace15 What a silly thing to complain about. It’s great that more women are finding ways to keep their babies.
How I’ve felt all day. What is it about dark winter days that make one feel so sleepy? https://t.co/nVKPx7O5Vw
This is so sad. Those poor people. https://t.co/gQS1VMGSts
If someone asked you to tell them a story, what story would you tell them?
@arturo_calisto I’m wondering the same thing. 😄
@AuthorSJB Maybe you should give him a chance. 😄
@Alexandria_SZ Thank you kindly, friend! How is your weekend going? Toronto got the prettiest little snowstorm this morning.
@OlliCrusoe Okay, I totally misunderstood the link. I thought you made them into pictures or gifs or something. 😄
@ECentauri @Chrystaroth That was great. 😄
@OlliCrusoe How are people allowed to use these? Should we credit you once? Every time? Occasionally?
@DavidBridger Glad to hear it.
@DavidBridger Sorry to hear you’re having a bad day. I hope you get a lot of rest.
@michellehazen Cool. Thanks for sharing it. 👍🏻
Happy superb owl day. 😉 #superbowl https://t.co/W69yAfZb0x
@tmamone Sounds good.
@tmamone What are you feasting on today?
@OlliCrusoe That does look really good. Nice job.
@OlliCrusoe Cool.
@OlliCrusoe Nice. How are you planning to season or sauce them once they’re cooked?
@michellehazen I just placed a hold on it at my local library. It sounds good!
@AuthorSJB @jpscrawlings How interesting.
@Hannah_Chutzpah @BeauWillimon That’s wonderful.
I’m puzzled by this as well. Does anyone have any theories? https://t.co/xhne6I98db
@wordblender I vote yes. (Assuming you’re talking about the meal that hobbits have after second breakfast. :) )
@BlippyTheSlug That’s interesting. It’s only like that on major holidays here in Toronto. Sundays are basically like any other day.
I can’t stop chuckling at this. https://t.co/Cj6mB5175t
@TheAlexxcast Okay. Hope tomorrow is a better day for you.
@TheAlexxcast Do you want jokes? Gifs? Encouragement? Something else?
This should say February, not November. 🙄 I definitely don’t plan stuff like this 9 months in advance. Haha. https://t.co/sVszyMZNQH
.@tinnitustoolbox You’re welcome again. So glad you liked it. :)
@janlmayes You’re welcome.
On #WorldCancerDay I’m thinking of everyone I know who has been diagnosed with it. Many have survived it. Some have not. But all are loved.
@jamesgummer That is too funny.
@NinjaTheory22 I’d half-forgotten that was coming, but I’m looking forward to it, too.
@AuthorIzzy Yes, agreed.
@NinjaTheory22 Ooh, good ones.
@michellehazen Ooh, cool. I haven’t read that book (or series?) yet. Is Name of the Wind what I should be googling?
@michellehazen Heh, same here. I was so excited for that movie only to be horribly disappointed by the whole thing.
@BlippyTheSlug Into that show, I mean. Although I’ve never guest-starred on it either. 😛
@BlippyTheSlug I have no idea. I’ve never been in that show. It’s very possible, though!
I hope that some of the books I mentioned are made into films/shows someday. Until then, I’ll look forward to #TheHandmaidsTale this spring.
Robert J. Sawyer’s Neanderthal Parallax trilogy would make a great TV show, too. Imagine Neanderthals thriving in the 21st century!
Arthur Phillips "Angelica: A Novel" would make a fantastic Gothic ghost movie.
World War Z should be redone as a TV show that actually follows the book’s plot.
I would love to see Jean M. Auel’s Earth’s Children series turned into a miniseries. Lifetime briefly considered it last year!
What books do you think should be made into miniseries, TV shows, or movies?
@VampireNomad Sweet! Could you DM me your email address? I thought I had it already, but apparently I do not. :)
@BlippyTheSlug no, I wasn’t. I’ll watch them later, though. They sound funny.
@Tranphasmagoria @lilylayer4 I don’t think it’s too much to ask at all. Haha.
November 7 is #SendACardToAFriendDay. If any of my followers would like an e-card from me on that day, DM me your email address.
@sarahmozal @LoraHughes7 I absolutely adore that. How sweet.
Suggestion Saturday: https://t.co/uDsCzHlxVN With links from @SylvesterPoetry, @apexmag, @GershonBenKeren, and… https://t.co/FRfQhs9bFo
@jdubqca You’re welcome.
Twitter feels a little sleepy to me this morning. I have the urge to brew some tea and speak gently to you until you fully wake up. 😇🍵
@jdubqca Thank you for sharing all of the links you do.
@lisasevern @Mermaids_Gender That is terrible. I hope she’ll be okay.
@AuthorSJB @TheFlyerAd Thank you for sharing it with me. How interesting.
“When one door closes, lock it securely, along with all your other doors, before any inspirational quotes get in.” - @thewritertype
@TammySchoch The little ones in North America are. I have no idea what giant African snails are like, though.
What an intriguing idea for a story. https://t.co/CvzpEgx5j4
@Vodstok Sigh, pure foolishness.
@Vodstok I don’t understand people who do that.
@AngelaMCaldwell I’m feeling the same way. Of course those feelings aren’t true, though!
@prnancarrow Thank you!
My thoughts exactly. 😄 https://t.co/Xeaxmpx4Vg
@YoungHeike You’re welcome. My fingers are crossed for you. Hehe.
@GreenEyedTgirl What an unique thought. I don’t know what to say about it. :)
@lisasevern Yep, life is good. :)
For those of you whose thoughts aren’t organized at the moment, what was the last incoherent thought to fly through your mind? :D
What was the last coherent thought to fly through your mind?
@bleepnik Aww, cute. I thought it was CGI at first, too. I’d never seen such a big snail before.
@Beforehand That is too funny.
Fellow bloggers, Apex Magazine needs your help: https://t.co/Qed5Gm7jle. I’m participating in this. Hope some of you will as well.
@AuthorIzzy @maureenjohnson Yes, it’s everywhere.
@SamEifling @Skelemika That’s awesome.
@OlliCrusoe Sounds fun to me.
@_Alexis_Marie Lovely. It looks like a soft and comfortable place to sit.
“Nobody dies from lack of sex. It’s lack of love we die from.” - #TheHandmaidsTale
@JudithAdanma @jamesgummer I know, right? :)
@RachelintheOC @joinwakeupworld I agree. I’ve been seeing a lot more empathy in the world these past few years.
@PurpleSaline @VampireNomad Thank you. That means a lot.
I never thought I’d find a snail cute, but I think I just changed my mind. https://t.co/T2VRKudy6K
I hope nobody needs to use this, but it’s good to be prepared just in case. https://t.co/hzV4TLIhT4
